# Blog

<a href="https://krmax44.de"><img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/url-krmax44.de-green.svg?logo=data:image/png;base64,"></a>

## Setup

```bash
git clone https://github.com/krmax44/blog.git
yarn install
yarn dev # http://localhost:4000

# deploying
yarn deploy
```

## Excluded files

See `.gitignore`.

- Drafts `source/_drafts` are not included.
- My imprint is not included.
